Nova CLI.ldesc: Access Nova System directly with Nova CLI, read and write files, execute functions and return data.

Rubix Timer.desc: Full Rubiks cube timer with scramble.

Rubix Timer.ldesc: Rubiks cube timer with smart interface and help. Also includes codes for scramble and presise timer to three magnitudes.

Textame.ldesc: Create formatted HTML files without code. Text editor for rich text editing in NovaOS.

To Do App.desc: A standard To Do list which remembers your tasks!

To Do App.ldesc: Create a To Do list of stuff you need to do - so that you won't forget. Updated by funsparktv.

Tic Tac Toe.ldesc: Play the game of Tic Tac Toe with your friends with same screen multiplayer!

JS definer.desc: Paste any JS code to identify what is happening under the hood in a more simpler language.

JS definer.ldesc: Define any JS code in a more simpler language.

Artion.desc: A sophisticated web application for drawing

Artion.ldesc: Create your artwork and download them with a click of a button!

Ducks Quack.desc: Pictures of ducks for all. To ensure global peace.

Ducks Quack.ldesc: An app that shows pictures of ducks with a panning animation.

Stable Diffusion.desc: Text to Image Generator based on Stable Diffusion.

Stable Diffusion.ldesc: 'Stable Diffusion' is an innovative Text to Image Generator application that utilizes advanced stable diffusion techniques to seamlessly translate textual descriptions into visually compelling images.

Calier.ldesc: HTML code editor with same screen preview and dynamic UI. Uses Ace editor.

OSL Editor.desc: Make apps with OriginOS's Origin Scripting language.

OSL Editor.ldesc: Create with OriginOS's Origin Scripting language with file saving, open as window, open inline etc.

WCanvas2.desc: An full HTML, Python, OSL code editor.

WCanvas2.ldesc: An HTML, OSL and python code editor with hotkeys, syntax highlighting, same screen previews, help and much more!

Lizabot3.desc: A personal Chatbot that don't hallucinate

Lizabot3.ldesc: A modern UI for Lizabot3, a personal chatbot that browses the internet and leverage it to make results without the use of AI.

OriginOS Access.desc: The best GUI for OSL and OASM.

OriginOS Access.ldesc: Origin is the Web Desktop GUI for running OSL and OASM. It is the best Turbowarp OS. Version 4.9.9, hosted and made by Mistium.

NovaAI.ldesc: Nova AI, your intelligent virtual assistant, offers instant access to accurate information through its sleek interface and intuitive design. With advanced algorithms and integration with Wikipedia, Nova AI ensures reliable answers to a wide range of inquiries, making it your go-to companion for all your needs.

PySphere.ldesc: A python runner based on skulpt that lets you write and run Python code directly in your browser. It features syntax highlighting, code completion, and a user-friendly interface.

Nova Chess.ldesc: Nova Chess redefines chess gaming with a web-based platform designed to cater to both casual players and chess enthusiasts alike. It features live game evaluation! Ensuring a visually appealing and intuitive interface. Players interact directly with the board, clicking on pieces to execute moves seamlessly.

BlockHTML.ldesc: Theres blocks with text that you can drag and drop to make source codes for webpages (HTML, CSS and JS). Now with more functions and advanced live previews.

Dot Engine.desc: Minimal beat editor tool with waveform editing.

Dot Engine.ldesc: Digital oscillator editor tool with minimal beat maker UI.
